string.value: You have reached Level 50 and #b#p9010000##k starts a conversation with you...

#p9010000# tells you since you have reached Level 50, you can receive a #bspecial gift#k from #p1201000#.

#i1112414:# 

You are told to go straight to #b#m140000000##k and meet #b#p1201000##k.
Your received #t1112414# from #p1201000#. A special ring that can be worn by any character within the same account. It looks like an item that is not just for an Aran, but for any character.

Hi there, #h0#. Congratulations on getting to Level 50! *Clap clap clap* I don't know if you are aware of this, but because reached Level 50, you are entitled to a #bspecial gift#k. It's a ring that I prepared with #p1201000#! Want to know what kind of ring it is?

#i1112414:# #t1112414#\n#t1112414# looks exactly like this! This item cannot be in traded with other users, but it can be transferred to your other characters within the SAME ACCOUNT, so #bany character in your account can wear this ring#k.
This event will be run through #bJune 9th of 2010#k, so I suggest you head over to #b#m140000000##k and meet #p1201000# before that! #p1201000# will be waiting for you.
Are you still confused about the event? Then talk to me, and I will explain it to you again.
Welcome, Aran. I'm sure you've already heard, but I have a present for you that I prepared with #p9010000#. It's this ring.
I made it because it just makes me happy to watch you grow stronger by the day. Now, keep training!
Haven't you gone to see #p1201000# yet? #b#p1201000##k is anxiously waiting for you in #b#m140000000##k.
